Callable - Interface in jtxt.emulator.tui
In order to receive notification of events which are generated by the terminal and routed to TUI components, a class must implement this interface and pass itself into an appropriate method for registering itself with a Component that it wishes to listen to.

changeColor(WritableRaster, Color) - Method in class jtxt.emulator.BitmapFont
For the glyph defined by the given Raster, the visible areas of the letter form will be transformed to the specified color, and all pixels of the same color as colorMask (not accounting for the alpha component) will be filtered out of the Raster returned from this method.
